parameters.name: PipelineIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the MPS queues that you want to query. To view the IDs, you can log on to the **MPS console** and choose **Global Settings** > **Pipelines** in the left-side navigation pane. You can query up to 10 MPS queues at a time. Separate multiple IDs of MPS queues with commas (,).
